items.title: US market selloff intensifies as Nasdaq Composite tumbles 2.5% on looming trade tensions
items.description: The Nasdaq Composite saw the steepest decline, plunging 2.5 percent as tech heavyweights came under pressure. Shares of Alphabet and Amazon tumbled more than 3 percent each, while Microsoft and Meta shed around 2 percent.

items.title: Bulk & Block deals: Goldman Sachs Singapore buys 60 lakh Zomato shares, Kadensa offloads 3.85 lakh in HAL
items.description: Blue Diamond Properties bought 10 lakh shares of ideaForge March 28. Meanwhile, Florin Tree Enterprise sold the same amount of shares at Rs 344.95 per share.

items.title: Adani Green Energy' subsidiary starts 37.5 MW solar power project in Gujarat’s Khavda
items.description: Adani Green Energy share price: With this, the company's total renewable energy capacity has risen to 13,737.8 MW.

items.title: NSE revises market lot sizes for derivative contracts on select indices
items.description: Under the revision, the market lot for BANKNIFTY will increase from 30 to 35, while MIDCPNIFTY will see a rise from 120 to 140.

items.title: SAMIL seeks to soothe investors as Trump tariff worries weigh on auto stocks
items.description: SAMIL’s stock dropped 2.22 percent to Rs 132 on March 27, in tandem with a broader selloff in auto and auto component stocks.

items.title: Market extends gains in second week; rupee gains
items.description: Indian rupee gained against the dollar as it ended higher by 51 paise at 85.46 per dollar on March 28 against the March 21 closing of 85.97.

items.title: Prestige Estates to invest Rs 1,625 crore in hospitality arm via rights issue
items.description: Since the company is a wholly-owned subsidiary, the transaction is categorized as a related-party deal, but Prestige Estates has stated it will be conducted at arm’s length.
